name: Neighbouring Gestapo
description:
Abril de 2020. Esta pequeña experiencia narrativa relata la cara oscura del confinamiento y de quien se encuentra en ella, quienes fueron apodados en Redes Sociales la "Gestapo Vecinal"

April 2020. This short narrative experiences shows the dark face of the lockdown and of those who are in there, whom were nicknamed as the "Neighbouring Gestapo".

Minor bugs are now fixed, but sadly, the new version has to be uploaded after the jam rating-time (5 May).

@IkerDDV
